DOC.brief_summary: This study aim calibrate Multiple Sclerosis Functional Composite ( MSFC ) home implementation phase 2 trial lisinopril multiple sclerosis . In initial stage , participant require travel study site one day week three week complete MSFC . They also require complete MSFC home weekly three week use remote sense technology video conferencing .
DOC.brief_title: Endpoint Calibration Phase 2 Study Lisinopril Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males female age 18 64 . 2 . Documented informed consent 3 . Documented diagnosis RRMS via 2010 McDonald Criteria 4 . Normal blood pressure baseline : 90140 mmHg systolic AND 6090 mmHg diastolic 5 . Baseline score 05.5 Kurtzke 's Expanded Disability Status Scale ( EDSS ) 6 . Availability person home physically able willing steady subject s/he lose balance walk test . 1 . Hypotensive baseline : < 90 mmHg systolic < 60 mmHg diastolic 2 . Hypertensive baseline : > 140 mmHg systolic > 90 mmHg diastolic 3 . Bradycardia baseline : < 50 bpm
